message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. While $9,000 is a good starting point, I'm still hoping for a bit more.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. That's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price for both of us.
